description.title: iPad mini 2023 - compact and powerful tablet with the A15 Bionic chip
text: iPad mini 2023 is a compact and powerful tablet with the A15 Bionic chip, which offers you incredible performance, graphics and speed.
This tablet has a Liquid Retina display with True Tone and P3, which provides great image quality and smooth motion. You can also enjoy high-quality sound with four speakers and Dolby Atmos support.

description.title: Work and create with fun
text: iPad mini 2023 supports Apple Pencil (2nd generation), which lets you write, draw and take notes with amazing accuracy and responsiveness. You can also connect Magic Keyboard or Smart Keyboard Folio, to turn your iPad into a laptop with a full-size keyboard and touchpad.

With iPad mini 2023 you can use all your favorite apps and games from the App Store, as well as work with professional programs, such as Adobe Photoshop, Final Cut Pro and more. You can also communicate with your friends and colleagues using FaceTime HD camera with Center Stage feature, which automatically adjusts the frame based on your movement.
